original_title: Across the Dirt A Dirt Bike Documentary
overview: Across The Dirt: A Dirt Bike Documentary movie was released Sep 23, 2008 by the Victory Multimedia studio. Standard Screen; Soundtrack English With thrilling footage from America's fiercest dirt-bike competitions--including the AMA National Hill Climb at Glen Helen and Mammoth Motocross--ACROSS THE DIRT showcases the sport's most gifted riders as they compete to be the best.
title: Across the Dirt A Dirt Bike Documentary
